wordpressPost.title: 2018-2019 Developing WebSites
wordpressPost.content:
Websites design and development

  • I produced several sites for small Businesses in Guadeloupe creating custom templates from scratch or using wordpress themes and/or bootstrap depending on their needs.
  • Developed projects with vanilla JS and different frameworks such as React, Gatsby and modern workflow tools : Saas, GitHub, Gulp, Npm, Node.js.
wordpressPost.excerpt: Websites design and development I produced several sites for small Businesses in Guadeloupe creating custom templates from scratch or using wordpress themes and/or bootstrap depending on their needs. Developed projects with vanilla JS and different frameworks such as React, Gatsby and modern workflow tools : Saas, GitHub, Gulp, Npm, Node.js.
